attributes.action: put in place a policy of ZERO TOLERANCE against crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long vicious attacks against innocent people trying to protect their property are being ignored by the courts.Sentences are too lenient. Punishments do not fit the crime.  People are being beaten to death by criminal yobs who are allowed to roam the streets. The Police are understaffed and undermined by the the courts. Crime is on the increase. The simple reason is  there are no deterrents in place.The law has to be changed to protect its citizens.The government has to be made aware that we have had enough. Something has to be done NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
